Patio furniture dirty

If you are looking to stay in a dump, this place is just for you. Better amenities are found under a bridge. Upon arrival, the place was completely useless. The fridge, stove, and dishwasher were all broken. The gas was shut off but was later turned on, which led to our evacuation because gas was leaking into our AirBnb. On top of that, the place was filthy along with the outside. There were also cockroaches in some of the rooms. So again, if you are looking to stay in a complete dump, this place is for you!

Overall the stay was decent. It wasn't the best. When arrived, the master's bathroom shower head was dripping and was difficult to turn on. Above all, the outside patio where the campfire is didn't work. We checked the propane which was half full. The seating area was half-broken from the last group reserved it and it was really dirty. We had requested help but no follow-up to it and delay responses to our needs. As much as the campfire was not really a necessity, it was part of the price we paid for. The place does provide extra towels as needed, and a working washer and dryer with detergent to clean any dirty or wet clothes. There are kitchenwares that can be used during your visit to cook breakfast, lunch, or dinner. I would rate the visit a 7 out of 10. It could be better and does need some improvement.

We rented this house mainly for the pool and were disappointed. When we got there, it was very cloudy and dirty. There were beer cans and dirty bandages we had to pick up outside. We contacted the host that day and never got an answer, someone just showed up the next day and put some things in it. There were a few broken things, outside furniture, fence posts, the master shower only had one temperature, scalding hot and burnt a guest. There weren‚Äôt any instructions to show us how to manage the pool and house temperatures, the lights, or house in general. The kitchen didn‚Äôt have most of the items it was supposed to. A random man walked right into the fenced in pool area where there was a quest sunbathing saying he was there to mow the lawn, but there wasn‚Äôt any grass. He was trying to walk around and take pictures and we said we had no knowledge of this and to please leave. The host didn‚Äôt know of a lawn appt. We were disappointed in the overall cleanliness of the house and wish it was easier to contact the host.

The rooms are small. The second bedroom has very little space and has a Murphy bed. The sofa is a day bed sofa so not very comfortable when hanging out. It‚Äôs a very average furniture. Doesn‚Äôt given a cosy comfy feel.

My children and I (mom) booked this property and did not stay any of the three day booking, due to the unsafe environment. Drug deals were being made in the parking lot. Our vehicles were being scoped out for possible damage/theft, locals came out of their rentals and harassed us. Homeless camps were set up in the parking areas and on adjacent roads. I called Airbnb for assistance and they thought I was calling the police and scattered temporarily. Thus far, the host has not refunded any of my three nights payment. The property is clean inside, but I could not risk my cars or worse, family being harmed.

Worried about the stress of travel?
well book with Evonify and you'll be able to eliminate some of that stress, from a pain free check in, good customer service, and a clean place to sleep.

bad communication on having no hot water the whole week I stayed there, no information was provided on how to enter the gated buildings and had to walk around the whole area every night to find an open door to get in. wifi was slow. many pieces of furniture were broken

The apartment smelled horrible and damp.  The bed sheets and furniture were NOT clean and covered in hair - we had to wash linens before staying in the apartment. And - the loud traffic outside never let's you sleep.  However, all that being said - the place did grow on us after a couple of days - with the doors open and a good breeze blowing ,  we would book this place again 'if' we couldn't find anything better next time.

The location of this place overall felt unsafe and dirty. Upon arriving at the location homeless people were on the steps, leading to the apartment smoking and using the bathroom. The entire complex smells of urine and feces. The unit itself has decent furniture but smells of mold and mildew. The window in the bedroom was open upon arrival allowing all the outside odors in or out, with no screen further allowing mosquitoes and other insects Inside. After cancel the trip and asking for an refund the company made false claims and kept my deposit on top of my dog fee that was to cover the 14 day trip. This company Evonify is unprofessional, unethical, and I hope you never have to deal with them. I travel a lot for work( traveling medical professional) and this by far has been the worst experience.

El lugar muy bien, el departamento muy c√≥modo, el √∫nico problema es que no te dan alguna llave para el acceso al edificio, y tienes que caminar alrededor del edificio esperando encontrar alguna puerta abierta, esto es dif√≠cil sobre todo por las noches.

The night before our stay we were informed that our Airbnb was undergoing emergency maintenance so we were switched to another air bnb in a area we weren‚Äôt expecting because the first one was by family.
As we arrived for early checkin the cleaning lady was still there and didn‚Äôt know we had early checkin, she said she was done but as she left I looked around and the place was very dirty. Shower was not clean, hair on bed and pillows, some of the window shades were missing, dust and dirt on the floors. They offered to come back but with a newborn and our dog I didn‚Äôt expect the offer and cleaned myself because we drove 8+ hours I expected it to be clean the first time.
I don‚Äôt normally complain about places but I needed to be honest so other people aren‚Äôt struck with the same problem. We got a refund on the early checkin which was nice but the area wasn‚Äôt the best and noise was a big issue. If you aren‚Äôt a deep sleeper then this isn‚Äôt the place for you, the traffic noise is very loud.

my stay at your property was not good.  The doorhad trouble opening, the air conditioning was dripping too much water, the internet information was not in the check-in information, and the rate for the dogs was also not described in the apartment's advertisement.

Visitors BEWARE!! The unit in the photo is not the one you will be staying in. Although the layout is the same, the advertised amenities are definitely NOT the same. You will get a room with a cheap bed, and side table!! There was water leaking from the ceiling, broken blinds, a filthy carpet in the living room and a very sticky floor throughout the unit!!

The icing on the cake was when a gentleman used the door code to enter the unit while I was in the shower!! Apparently, he was not told it was occupied. I shutter to think what would have happened if my husband wasn‚Äôt there!!

I received an ‚Äúapology‚Äù from someone claiming to management with an offer for a free night ‚Äúnext time‚Äù as if I would ever subject myself or my daughter to that experience again!! I have never been so disgusted in my life. They managed to ruin the experience of bringing our daughter to college. Thanks a lot! Grrrr!

Das Apartment eignet sich f√ºr einen kurzen Aufenthalt. Wir waren mit Freunden √ºbers Wochenende dort. F√ºr 4 Personen ist es ideal, da es zwei Schlafzimmer gibt. Die f√ºnfte Person musste auf dem Sofa schlafen, das leider kein Schlafsofa ist.
Die Kommunikation verlief reibungslos und schnell, so dass ein Problem schnell gel√∂st werden konnte.
Ausreichend Parkpl√§tze befinden sich vor der T√ºr.
Wir haben nicht gekocht und hatten auch keine Lebensmittel in der Wohnung und dennoch gab es t√§glich kleine Kakerlaken in der K√ºche und in einem der Schlafzimmer. Wer diesbez√ºglich empfindlich ist, sollte darauf vorbereitet sein ;)
It was a good, accurate to the pictures. The only problem was the lock is a bit hard to work as well as the check in time is inconvenient. But otherwise owner responds fast

This was my worst air bnb stay yet. First of all there is some misleading advertising in the listing for the unit. It says in three different places that they are pet friendly and it‚Äôs not until you read all the way down into the description that they mention it‚Äôs for a fee also there is no on-site laundry it‚Äôs just a laundromat next-door. While the apartment was decorated all right and was very clean, the amenities and the items stocking the apartment are atrocious such as ONE pair of crappy gym quality towels and cheap items that are almost impossible not to break to name a few. The apartment was boiling hot and we were unable to change the temperature at all and when I contacted someone to help me out with it the issue was not resolved and it got so hot that me and my partner ended up having to sleep in different rooms to avoid the extra body heat. Honestly for the listed great to stay here I expected much much better. I was so angry that I have spent over $90 a day and a place that I would not feel comfortable spending more than $60 a day in. Such a rip off. Not to mention there was construction going on in the apartment complex the entire time I was there so it was extremely loud all day

Not great. Space is fine, but communication was poor. They have electronic locks on the bedroom doors, one of which failed and locked a guest inside bedroom 2. Took us hours to get in touch with the hosts to get him free. Serious fire risk.
They also charge a $100+ cleaning fee, but ask you to do the tidying up before you leave. Wouldn't stay again.

The worst Airbnb I stayed:
1. Dirty dishes in cabinet and unwashed dishes in the dishwasher.
2. Left over pizza in the oven
3. Found someone‚Äôs socks in the washer and not dryer
4. Door latch broke so couldn‚Äôt close the door when sleep
5. Bugs - ant and roaches in house
6. No hand soap
7. It‚Äôs a duplex (shared wall) so you could hear others
8. They left some welcoming Oreos that are expired 2 months ago.

Owner has apologized but things are not fixed so I would not recommend and will not stay here again. Neighborhood is just okay except it‚Äôs close to the domain.

I had high positive expectations going in. I asked Michael for instructions about how to use appliances and televisions etc. This is a common problem - my request was ignored and I had real problems with them.

I literally could not enter the house initially because of a poorly installed electronic door lock which had to be Jimmied to open. The strike plate was installed at a weird angle because someone had tried to break the door open and the door jam had not been professionally repaired correctly so the deadbolt was "catching".

Fortunately I had a young home services professional nearby who figured out the problem and was able to gain entry and explain to me how to "jimmy" the lock upon entry each time. When the AirBnB folks came to replace this unit eventually I showed them the problem and they fixed the strike plate problem.

The bed was comfortable and the AC worked fine. The Dryer needed cleaning, which I did, and it worked well (as did the washer. The Oven never worked.

I don‚Äôt ever leave bad reviews in fact, this is my first bad review on AirBnb. Upon arrival just getting into the Airbnb was pretty confusing with the directions and different gates. When I got inside it was at 80 percent humidity in the unit and had a strong smell of mildew. It also appears different than how the photos make it seem. I couldn‚Äôt stand staying in the unit for longer than 20 minutes so I left. The owner declined to respond to me offer any sort of partial refund‚Ä¶.

Completely negative experience with this host.

HOST: I was hosting a bachelor party during my stay and several of my mates bailed out THREE WEEKS IN ADVANCE. I asked the host if he could cancel and he absolutely did not budge. I was very transparent with the host and he just would not work with me. The only thing he said he could refund me was the cleaning fee. Which was only 1/8th the total cost of the stay. This forced me to think on the fly, and to get people to try and stay at this Airbnb even when we didn‚Äôt want to. I even called Airbnb support to help, and he still was not willing to cancel!! Ended up only being 3 of us of the original 7. So I lost out on several hundreds of dollars because this host was greedy. Not cool.

CLEANLINESS: This place was fine. But cleanliness was not fit for the amount we paid for this cleaning cost. There were dead bugs on the walls. Misquitos were a problem. AND there were leftover chips in one the bowls! Absolutely unacceptable.

SIZE: This place is small. For what it‚Äôs worth he said it could not sleep 7 people, however, it couldn‚Äôt really even sleep the max which is 6 people. There are two queen beds in one room (a bunk bed) and another queen bed in the other. And a couch. Bed was uncomfortable.

INSTRUCTIONS: Obviously copy and pasted, and didn‚Äôt really match what need to happen to check out.

FLOORS: Floors were warped throughout the house. It was not comfortable and could be a safety issue. Also, not very accessible for people in wheelchairs.

Overall negative experience. Extremely disappointed.

Jason was adamant about the contract, despite an ice storm and city and state warnings not to travel into Austin unless necessary. Despite polite requests, explaining delayed flights due to weather, and that I couldn't risk getting stuck in Austin if I did make it out there, he would not budge on a refund or partial refund. I found him and this space inhospitable and business/revenue-focused, with no consideration for the many risks I'd have to take to sit in the space for two days and wait out the storm before getting back on a plane. The main draw of the space is the pool, and in an ice storm/in winter in Austin, that should not be the selling point of the space. It's unusuable this time of year, and that should be clearly noted for those of us unfamiliar with the new extreme weather patterns in Texas.

Ultimately, I was forced to pay for a space I couldn't safely use with no consideration or concern from the host whatsoever.

There‚Äôs adequate space for 2 which is exactly as pic‚Äôd.  At no point during booking, check in, our stay or check out did we encounter anything that would prevent us from booking this studio when visiting our Austin family (and their spare room is already taken).  We‚Äôll check availability at Lynn & Mario‚Äôs before booking elsewhere.
2 different directions for parking caused confusion and a little frustration on both sides. Otherwise the property was very nice.

1 bedroom condo in fairly walkable location if not a bit hilly.  Lots of trees.  Place is comfy.   Washer and Dryer in complex requires app (which never worked on 2 different android phones) or coins; about $4 for each load.   Condo is functional but not a lot of room for luggage; closet is locked; no good place to put clothing.

The only bad thing I can say is get a new cleaner the bathroom smell was absolutely disgusting of old urine just not clean at all the grass in the yard was very long so my small dogs didn‚Äôt really want to play out in it. We found a roach in the tub alive and one almost dead one in the closet of bedroom the linen provided in the bedrooms was less then adequate we had to stay an extra night due to work and she did make that easy to do as lack of money wouldn‚Äôt allow his to stay somewhere else cleaner. Other then the cleanliness everything else was good.

I had to find a different location when I checked in due to unsafe conditions: windows not locking, no window coverings‚Ä¶you can see in house from all directions, etc.

The pool was dirty and the house smelled terrible. Had to get Airbnb involved to refund money. It was a fiasco.

There were mice in the room.

When I informed the host, they wouldn't even refund the night we left because of the mice, and told us to contact Airbnb support.

This was also the second animal infestation I experienced. The first was something living in the roof. The place was also fairly dirty (e.g. a dead cockroach, lots of dead bugs).

Exellent house which is enough for
15 members party and nice maintenance.

But main negative is they have charged double for the cleaning it is not fair.
Comfortable beds.  Steep driveway.  Don‚Äôt plan on making meals. No microwave and no television.

Great location, not so great of a stay. There was not actually a dryer, though listed, and the shower knobs were broken in both bathrooms which made turning off and on the water really hard. Overall we made it and maintenance came to fix the shower knobs on Day 3. No response at all on the missing dryer.

Die Unterkunft war wirklich toll, wunder sch√∂n und voll ausgestattet. Es ist auch m√∂glich ohne Auto zur Unterkunft zu kommen, wenn ma einen ca. 15min Gehweg in kauf nimmt. Die Unterkunft ist sehr gut aufgeteilt so dass man sich mit ander G√§sten fast nicht in die quere kommt. Die W√§nde sind wie √ºblich in US-Geb√§uden sehr d√ºnn und hellh√∂rig, entsprechend konnte man bei diesem Zimmer sehr genau h√∂ren was in der K√ºche passiert. Ich hatte das Pech, dass weitere G√§ste jeden Tag bereits um 6am gefr√ºhst√ºckt haben und mich das, obwohl sie sehr leise waren, jeden Tag geweckt hat.
Ansonsten war es ein sehr tolles Erlebnis, die Hosts waren extrem zuvorkommend und hilfsbereits und ich w√ºrde jederzeit wieder zur√ºck kommen.
Danke f√ºr Alles!

Jordan cancelled our stay just a few house before checking in while we were on our flight to Austin. When we landed we had no where to go and had to scramble to find another home during one of the busiest weeks in the city (F1). We ended up having to pay $2300 more for a sub-par home because of this.

Jordan shouldn‚Äôt be allowed to be a host based on doing this and if he still is I would caution against ever booking his home due to his actions.

My wife and I took a chance on this listing since there were no other reviews when we booked it. There were a number of issues and we ended up having Airbnb help us rebook a new location for the remainder of our stay in Austin.

The pros:
Host was communicative and quick to respond to messages as well as friendly.

The cons:
The listing was not cleaned when we arrived (3 hours after check in started), we found a total of 4 dead cockroaches in one of the bedrooms and under the living room couch. There was visible dirt in the fridge on multiple shelves. The floors had visible dirt and dead bugs.

There was chicken wire stapled over both windows in the living room (so you could only open/close the blinds with great effort) which I had never seen before. One of the windows was broken with a hole to the outside (didn't help with the indoor air temperature).

There were digital locks to the two bedrooms within the listing (I assume it was previously sublet out to different people) and they were different from each other and the locks used on the entry doors (plus they weren't the most intuitive locks).

The location is in a bit seedier of an area.

A number of items were older/worn out or not working well. For instance one of the toilets didn't flush, faucet handles were difficult to use, blinds didn't fully cover the bedroom window etc.

With a number of upgrades and attention to detail this listing could be decent in the future.

While the airbnb itself is nice, it was not the most pleasant experience I have ever had and the pictures are misleading on size. We had 3 people, can't imagine being here with 4. The only seating in the living room is the couch so 1 person is forced to sit at the table. We had a 2 week stay booked for 3 and were only supplied a roll and a half of toilet paper, 4 towels, and 4 wash rags. When I inquired to see if extras could be provided considering we booked an extended stay the answer was no. Not a huge deal just inconvenient as it meant having to do more laundry. So when we attempted to do our first load of laundry we were going to use the starter laundry pods and dryer sheets that the hosts message AND house manual mentioned were under the kitchen sink. Well there were not any, so once again we reached out to the hosts and were met with the response of they don't supply those things for units without a washer and dryer. When I pointed out that their information on the unit said otherwise the response was that it's an automated message as most their spaces have a washer and dryer. How can the welcome message and the house manual both be wrong? This led to an incredibly frustrating and prolonged situation that could've been resolved by providing guests with accurate information. Also simple kitchen gadgets like a can opener were not provided. I could not shave my face because the bathroom outlet is ridiculously high, almost to the ceiling, so my cord wasn't long enough, my mom had to blow dry her hair in the living room. The internet was awful and clearly a cheap package, we had to reconnect the TV and our phones numerous times. The air was set to eco mode which caused us to wake up in our own sweat because it went up to 77 in the middle of the night. We switched it off eco mode and it became clear the hosts can control it remotely as well because they fought us constantly on the temp going back up to 77. So basically in a nutshell, rental is smaller than pictured, couch bed is just ok, location is nice, everything you need is a short ride away-15 min or so.

Roach infested. That was the biggest problem. The smaller problems were a matter of willingness to address issues. Coffee maker was broken and leaked an entire pot of coffee everywhere. On Saturday. I was told a replacement could be brought to me‚Ä¶ in a couple of days. Only 1 roll of the world‚Äôs cheapest toilet paper was provided and 2 full size bath towels. Reservation was for a week. Management company agreed to let me instacart a new coffee maker and roach bait and ant traps for reimbursement but it was too little too late. After I placed roach baits we woke up to several dead roaches on the counters and floors the following morning. I was scared to turn the lights off the sleep because I didn‚Äôt want roaches crawling all over my 2year old and me. The only positive was the host agreeing to end the reservation early and refund the remaining days.

The entire house was disgustingly dirty. I spilled something and cleaned it up and the paper came up absolutely black with animal hair all over. Smelled terrible as soon as I walked in. The shower does not work at all. The walls were even stained. Was charged 50$ cleaning fee but the rules told me I had to leave it exactly the same and even take the trash out (no trash cans available had to take home) or I would be charged. Looked nothing like the photos. So upset and disgusted, I wish I could‚Äôve gotten a refund instead I had to stay there. Worst air bnb I‚Äôve ever had in my life. Do not recommend staying here.

There were some issues with the listing, and we had trouble communicating with the hosts. Namely there was a lot of unexpected noise (thin walls, excessive banging in the middle of the night from another unit) and it was missing the washer/dryer amenities that were listed. At the very least, these were not in-unit.  When we washed our dishes in the kitchen sink, water began leaking from the dishwasher on to the floor. Communication with the hosts was difficult, as most responses seemed to be automated, and when we expressed our concerns we did not receive a reply.
15/10, you won‚Äôt be disappointed. If you‚Äôre looking for a more home-like feel to your stay in Austin look no further. Very beautiful home!
Near to airport is an advantage. You will have to let the host know in advance if you need anything in kitchen(Utensils), we had very limited things for cooking in our 3 day stay.

While the location was convenient, the house needs a lot of work. Drawers are broken, outside is very run down. We found multiple cockroaches in the kitchen, one in the fridge. The bathroom door was very stuck and we had multiple people get stuck including on the way out the door.
Great place for a few days. Kinda far from downtown, but in a quiet neighborhood. No issues!

The picture of the house is NOT the residence that I stayed at. Misleading. Falsification of information. House is not brand new, built in 2017.
This review is factual.
Good host but bummer that this spot is in the middle of nowhere.
Todo estuvo perfecto, sin muy agradables y amables. Gracias

must say that the accommodations are not adequate or comfortable. I won‚Äôt be staying another night. Here‚Äôs the reality:

1. The AC does not keep the room cool enough.
2. The room is small
3. There is no desk or private work area in the room
4. There are no hangers in the closet
5. The place is 20 minutes from the nearest bus stop and it‚Äôs even further to any stores or restaurants
6. The remote control is broken for the TV
7. There is no antenna on the TV. Therefore no local stations on TV
8. The room isn‚Äôt even worth $20 per night considering all of these inconveniences
9. Power outage didn‚Äôt help
10. Hard to even imagine what reason there is to stay at this property

It‚Äôs not worth staying at

Sue es una persona muy atenta con sus visitantes e hizo que mi estancia en su casa y en la ciudad sea muy c√≥moda y pr√°ctica. La casa totalmente limpia, as√≠ como la habitaci√≥n, el ba√±o y cada zona de su casa.
